description.value:
Moss and winding vines give this gnarled staff of wild wood a vibrant green tinge. You created this staff to aid you in speaking to the plants you met on your adventure and beseeching them to come to your aid.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Tanglefoot]{Tanglefoot}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Protector Tree]{Protector Tree} , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shillelagh]{Shillelagh}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Entangle]{Entangle}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shape Wood]{Shape Wood}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Tree Shape]{Tree Shape}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Wall of Thorns]{Wall of Thorns}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Barkskin]{Barkskin}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Speak with Plants]{Speak with Plants}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Plant Form]{Plant Form}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Wall of Thorns]{Wall of Thorns}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Nature's Reprisal]{Nature's Reprisal}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Plant Form]{Plant Form}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
